attributes.action: The new Conservative PM should NOT ask Her Majesty to prorogue parliament.
attributes.background: Various candidates vying to become leader of the Conservative Party have voiced their preparedness to Prorogue (suspend) Parliament in order to assure that Parliament cannot influence the Brexit process thus forcing the UK to leave the EU on the 31st of October 2019, most probably without 'a deal'.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

We aren't sure in what circumstances you would like the Government to prorogue or not prorogue Parliament.

You might like to sign and share this petition instead, which calls for a change to the law to require Parliament to agree to any prorogation:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/238085

You are more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition.
